basics.label: Dance Instructor
basics.summary: Enthusiastic dance instructor with superb leadership and communication skills. Easily cultivates trusting and productive relationships with students, parents, teachers and administration. Dedicated to creating a classroom atmosphere that is stimulating, encouraging and supportive for all students.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Providing quality instruction for various dance styles such as Ballet, Pointe, Jazz, Contemporary, Tap, Modern, and Musical Theatre.
